example.text: The Chinese Communist Party is using TikTok for espionage to gather sensitive information on Americans - this info will be used against our country in a future cyber war. "Let's make sure the CCP can't spy on Americans, then we can enjoy TikTok." - [[user]] [[url]]

This is something both the left and the right agree on: members of Congress shouldn't be buying and trading stocks. It's time to restore trust in our elected representatives. I'm proud to stand with this bipartisan group of lawmakers working to get this done. [[url]]

Today, I voted YES on HR 2, the Secure the Border Act. This bill resumes construction of the border wall, ends the failed catch and release policy, and gives our Border Patrol agents the critical resources they need to manage this humanitarian and security crisis.
